name: Oro (itch)
description:
You are Bogotá, a Muisca hero trying to save gold religious artifacts from Spanish invaders. Save all four artifacts before the Spanish steal them!

Technical Information: Created in GameMaker, Procreate, and Photoshop. 

Faculty Leads: Chelsea Brtis (Art & Art History) Julio Bahamón (Computer Science) Heather Freeman (Art & Art History)

Student Collaborators: Juliet Burton (Art & Art History) Robert Lopez-Perez (Computer Science) Rachel Pointer (Computer Science)

Funding: College of Arts and Architecture 2022 Faculty Research Grant,  The University of North Carolina at Charlotte
